ygData.subject: plane tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: as lvl 46 is quickly approaching, ive been having a few thoughts about the best way to go into the planes.  i know i always see casters duel outside so they
ygData.messageBody:
as lvl 46 is quickly approaching, ive been having a few thoughts about the
best way to go into the planes. i know i always see casters duel outside so
they dont lose their nice items in the planes, so i was thinking that a bard
should be able to do the same with a bag of instruments and food and drink.
ive been doing alot of instrument only fighting in solb, and there are times
where i think im actually doing more damage/help with my lute and songs,
than with my weapons. has anyone tried this tactic?

learic lovejam
xegony
